name: LinguistHouse Translation and Linguistic Services
tag_list: translation, linguistic-services, legal-translation, interpretation, copywriting, proofreading, ghostwriting, media-services, translation-company, translation-agency, document-translation-services, abu-dhabi, dubai, uae, arabic-to-english, french, abu-dha
overview:
LinguistHouse Translation & Linguistic Services is a trusted provider of translation, linguistic and content services in Arabic, French, as well as major world languages. It is conveniently located at the commercial heart of Abu Dhabi, UAE, with branches in Egypt and Lebanon.

It offers the full range of linguistic solutions that include legal translation of documents, general translation from and into the world’s major languages, localization, interpretation, equipment equipment rental, proofreading, editing and creative content writing like copywriting and ghostwriting.

The company’s strong point and competitive edge lies in the following elements:

  1. Impeccable quality, as it set very high linguistic and stylistic standards. The proof? Its long list of satisfied clients in diverse sectors over the years.

  2. Big team of translators and linguists. Leave it to LinguistHouse to finish your projects quickly and efficiently. Small documents get instantly translated while the client enjoys a cup of coffee, and bigger translation projects are strictly completed within deadlines.

  3. They’re almost always open! From 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM from Saturday to Thursday (GMT+4). â€ƒ

With a combined experience of around 50 years, LinguistHouse has a BIG TEAM of professional linguists who will ensure the best possible quality across languages and cultures.
